Bulletin

Apr 25, 2022

Hi Friends,

We're coming up on the Kinopio's third birthday, here's to another year of creative spatial thinking and new connections.

To help grow Kinopio into a sustainable business (i.e. it can at least pay my rent), I'll be raising the price for new users from $5/mo to $8/mo in about two weeks. Now's a good time to upgrade if you want to be grandfathered into the current price.

I'm always nervous about pricing changes but surprisingly (or maybe unsurprisingly) everyone seemed supportive of the move on twitter and discord.

What's New

  • Browser Extensions for quickly recording thoughts, inspirations, and urls. Download for Firefox, Chrome, and Safari
  • Save Space PDF Save your entire space as a PDF which you can send to your friends, or just keep for yourself
  • Personal Templates Turn your own spaces into easy to duplicate templates
  • Drag Connector to Add New Card Dragging and releasing a connection on empty space now creates a new blank card

  • Select Cards by Tag Click a card tag to select all other cards with that tag
  • Improved Multi-Card Styles options now open inline and stay open until you close them
  • Select All Below Make room in tight and busy spaces by hovering near the left edge and dragging to select all cards and connections below you
